title: Cottage to Let (restored) (1941, thriller, imdb score: 6.7)

sources.title: Cottage to Let (restored) (1941, thriller, imdb score: 6.7)
sources.description: Cottage to Let is a 1941 British spy thriller film directed by Anthony Asquith starring Leslie Banks , Alastair Sim and John Mills . Filmed during the Second World War and set in Scotland during the war, its plot concerns Nazi spies trying to kidnap an inventor. The film was shot at the Lime Grove Studios in London , with sets designed by the art director Alex Vetchinsky . The film includes the first appearance of George Cole , superbly confident as a cocky young evacuee.
